desc: Quality Hardware is a proudly Canadian owned and operated company that offers a full scope of commerical door hardware products that include mortise locksets, cylindrical locksets, door closers, hinges and exit devices for institutional, industrial, commercial and residential uses. Our values are reflected in our name

layout.text: QUALITY DOOR HARDWARE AT AFFORDABLE PRICES
Quality Hardware is your one-stop-shop for a large array of commercial door hardware products to suit every application and need.
